skills.name: Death Defied
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Innate:}} Upon {{tip|death|dying}}, {{ci|Karthus}} {{tip|Zombie state|enters a spirit form}} that allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} Upon taking {{tip|death|fatal damage}}, '''Karthus''' {{tip|Zombie state|remains active}} for 7 seconds, rendering himself unable to move, [[basic attack]], use [[summoner spell]]s, or [[Active ability items|activate items]], but becoming {{tip|untargetable}} and {{tip|cc-immune|immune to crowd control}} and preventing all incoming damage for the duration as well as being able to cast [[Champion ability|abilities]] at no cost.
If {{ai|Defile|Karthus}} has been learned, it will remain toggled on for ''Death Defied's'' entire duration. {{ai|Requiem|Karthus}} becomes disabled after ''Death Defied'' has lasted 4 seconds.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Upon taking fatal damage, Karthus remains active for 7 seconds, rendering himself unable to move, basic attack, use summoner spells, or Active ability items, but becoming untargetable and immune to crowd control and preventing all incoming damage for the duration as well as being able to cast Champion ability at no cost.
If Karthus's Defile has been learned, it will remain toggled on for Death Defied's entire duration. Karthus's Requiem becomes disabled after Death Defied has lasted 4 seconds.
skills.notes:
* Upon {{tip|Death}}, '''Karthus''' loses all {{tip|debuff|status effects}} (inherently including {{tip|crowd control}} effects) that do not inherently persist through death.
** An example for a debuff that does persist through death is {{cai|Blaze|Brand}}.
* ''Death Defied's'' {{tip|untargetability}} does not {{tip|homing projectile destruction|destroy}} in-flight {{tip|projectiles}}.
* {{ai|Chronoshift|Zilean}} and {{ii|Guardian Angel}} will take priority over ''Death Defied''.
* ''Death Defied'' will still trigger if '''Karthus''' is killed by the {{tip|Nexus Obelisk}}.
* '''Karthus''' cannot be {{tip|execute|executed}} by the {{bi|Aspect of the Dragon}} during ''Death Defied''.
* At the start of ''Death Defied'', '''Karthus''' is set to {{sti|health|{{as|1 health}}}}.
** '''Karthus''' can still regenerate his health over the duration, but he will always die at the end of it.
* After ''Death Defied'' ends, the corpse of '''Karthus''' will retain [[unit collision]] despite being dead on the ground.
* '''Karthus' ''' [[health bar|mana bar]] drains over the duration of ''Death Defied'' as an indicator of his time remaining in this state.

skills.name: Lay Waste
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Karthus}} unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies in a small area, '''doubled''' when only one target is struck.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karthus''' creates a blast at the target location which detonates after {{tt|{{rutngt|0.5}} to {{rutngt|0.75}}|See notes}}, granting {{tip|sight}} of the area before dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies within, {{ccs|doubled|magic}} when hitting only one target.
''Lay Waste's'' damage is reduced by 15% against {{tip|monster|monsters}}.
''During {{ai|Death Defied|Karthus}}, Lay Waste will cast at maximum range if cast beyond that.''
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Karthus creates a blast at the target location which detonates after 0.528 to 0.759, granting sight of the area before dealing magic damage to all enemies within, Unknown value: ccs / doubled / magic when hitting only one target.
Lay Waste's damage is reduced by 15% against monsters.
During Karthus's Death Defied, Lay Waste will cast at maximum range if cast beyond that.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|45 to 115}} {{as|(+ 35% AP)}}|Enhanced Damage|{{ap|45*2 to 115*2}} {{as|(+ {{ap|35*2}}% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
* The delay between the cast and the detonation is inconsistent, but always matches up with the VFX.{{bug}}
** {{ais|Defile|Karthus}} ticks beyond the first has a similar issue.
* Applies {{tip|spell damage}} if it hits a single target and {{tip|area damage}} if it hits multiple targets.
** ''Lay Waste'' also plays a different sound effect when it only hits one target.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 35% AP)
  • Enhanced Damage: (+ % AP)

• Monster Damage: (+ % AP)
  • Enhanced Monster Damage: (+ % AP)

skills.name: Wall of Pain
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} {{ci|Karthus}} creates a '''passable''' wall. Enemies that touch it are briefly {{tip|slow|slowed}} and have their {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance reduced}}}}.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karthus''' summons a passable wall of spectral energy at the target location perpendicular to his facing for 5 seconds, granting {{tip|sight}} around its pillars and center.

Enemies that pass through the wall for the first time from the same cast are {{tip|slow|slowed}} for 4 seconds, decaying over the duration, and have their {{sti|magic penetration|{{as|magic resistance reduced by 15%}}}} for the same duration.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Active: Karthus summons a passable wall of spectral energy at the target location perpendicular to his facing for 5 seconds, granting sight around its pillars and center.
Enemies that pass through the wall for the first time from the same cast are slowed for 4 seconds, decaying over the duration, and have their magic resistance reduced by 15% for the same duration.
skills.notes: * The wall will apply its effects to enemies who collide with it with their {{tip|gameplay radius}}.

skills.name: Defile
skills.blurb:
{{sbc|Passive:}} While toggled off, {{ci|Karthus}} regains {{sti|mana}} whenever he kills a unit.
{{sbc|Toggle:}} {{ci|Karthus}} surrounds himself in the souls of his prey, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all nearby enemies, quickly draining his own {{sti|mana}}.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Karthus''' restores {{sti|{{as|mana}}}} whenever he kills an enemy.
{{sbc|Toggle:}} '''Karthus''' deals {{as|magic damage}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds to all nearby enemies. Toggling ''Defile'' off deals 1 tick's worth of damage.
''Defile'' cannot be toggled off during {{ai|Death Defied|Karthus}}, but it can be while channeling {{ai|Requiem|Karthus}}.
skills.descriptionHtml:
Passive: Karthus restores mana whenever he kills an enemy.
Toggle: Karthus deals magic damage every 0.25 seconds to all nearby enemies. Toggling Defile off deals 1 tick's worth of damage.
Defile cannot be toggled off during Karthus's Death Defied, but it can be while channeling Karthus's Requiem.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage Per Tick|{{ap|30/4 to 110/4}} {{as|(+ 5% AP)}}|Damage Per Second|{{ap|30 to 110}} {{as|(+ 20% AP)}}}}
skills.notes:
*Toggle abilities do not count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
* ''Defile'' also restores {{tip|mana}} if '''Karthus''' destroys an enemy structure.
* ''Defile'' will automatically toggle on during {{ai|Death Defied|Karthus}}.
* ''Defile'' re-evaluates its damage with each tick, thus gaining/losing {{sti|AP}} or putting skill points into the ability will affect it immediately without the need to toggle it off and back on again.
* ''Defile'' will toggle off automatically if '''Karthus''' enters {{tip|resurrection}}.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage Per Tick: (+ 5% AP)
  • Damage Per Second: (+ 20% AP)

skills.name: Requiem
skills.blurb: {{sbc|Active:}} After {{tip|channel|channeling}} for 3 seconds, {{ci|Karthus}} deals {{as|magic damage}} to '''all''' enemy {{tip|champions}} on the map.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Karthus''' {{tip|channel|channels}} for 3 seconds then deals {{as|magic damage}} to all targetable enemy {{tip|champions}} upon its completion.
skills.descriptionHtml: Active: Karthus channels for 3 seconds then deals magic damage to all targetable enemy champions upon its completion.
skills.notes:
* ''Requiem's'' channel is telegraphed to all enemy champions by a beam of light that descends on all targets, including if they are {{tip|untargetable}} or even {{tip|death|dead}}.
* ''Requiem'' will affect {{tip|clone|clones}}.
* The damage will apply [[spell effects]] to targets in an order based on proximity to '''Karthus'''. Single target spell effects (such as {{ii|Luden's Tempest}}) are thus triggered on the ''closest'' enemy champion.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Karthus''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|cast=false|items=false,true|move=false|spells=true,interrupts,false,false,false}}
